thread.title: How Myanmar forces burned, looted and killed in a remote village

title: How Myanmar forces burned, looted and killed in a remote village
text:
How Myanmar forces burned, looted and killed in a remote village 5:57pm GMT - 03:34 
On Sept. 2, Buddhist villagers and Myanmar troops killed 10 Rohingya men in Myanmar's restive Rakhine state. Reuters uncovered the massacre and has pieced together how it unfolded. During the reporting of this article, two Reuters journalists were arrested by Myanmar police. Simon Lewis and Matthew Larotonda have more.
